getConversationTitle().Description: Return the title to be displayed on this conversation. May return null.

Parameters: boolean: true if the conversation represents a group, false otherwise.
setGroupConversation(boolean).Description: Sets whether this conversation notification represents a group. If the app is targeting Android P, this is required if the app wants to display the largeIcon set with @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#setLargeIcon_E@, otherwise it will be hidden.

addMessage(android.app.Notification.Mess.Description: Adds a @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#Message_E@ for display in this notification. The messages should be added in chronologic order, i.e. the oldest first, the newest last.

Parameters: CharSequence: A @B_java#lang#CharSequence_E@ to be displayed as the message content This value must never be null.
long: Time at which the message arrived

Person: The @B_android#app#Person_E@ who sent the message. Should be null for messages by the current user, in which case the platform will insert the user set in MessagingStyle(Person). This value may be null.
addMessage(java.lang.CharSequence,long,a.Description: Adds a message for display by this notification. Convenience call for a simple @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#Message_E@ in @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#addMessage_E@.
addMessage(java.lang.CharSequence,long,a.FullName: public Notification.MessagingStyle addMessage (CharSequence text, long timestamp, Person sender)

isGroupConversation().Description: Returns true if this notification represents a group conversation, otherwise false. If the application that generated this @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle_E@ targets an SDK version less than @B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#P_E@, this method becomes dependent on whether or not the conversation title is set; returning true if the conversation title is a non-null value, or false otherwise. From @B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#P_E@ forward, this method returns what's set by @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#setGroupConversation_E@ allowing for named, non-group conversations.

Parameters: Notification.MessagingStyle.Message: The historic @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#Message_E@ to be added
addHistoricMessage(android.app.Notificat.Description: Adds a @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#Message_E@ for historic context in this notification. Messages should be added as historic if they are not the main subject of the notification but may give context to a conversation. The system may choose to present them only when relevant, e.g. when replying to a message through a @B_android#app#RemoteInput_E@. The messages should be added in chronologic order, i.e. the oldest first, the newest last.

getMessages().Description: Gets the list of Message objects that represent the notification

getUserDisplayName().Description: use @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#getUser_E@ instead Returns the name to be displayed for any replies sent by the user
getUserDisplayName().history: Added in API level 24 Deprecated in API level 28

getHistoricMessages().Description: Gets the list of historic Messages in the notification.

Returns: the user to be displayed for any replies sent by the user This value will never be null.

Parameters: CharSequence: Required - the name to be displayed for any replies sent by the user before the posting app reposts the notification with those messages after they've been actually sent and in previous messages sent by the user added in @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#addMessage_E@ This value must never be null.
CharSequence: Title displayed for this conversation This value may be null.
setConversationTitle(java.lang.CharSeque.Description: Sets the title to be displayed on this conversation. May be set to null. This API's behavior was changed in SDK version @B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#P_E@. If your application's target version is less than @B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#P_E@, setting a conversation title to a non-null value will make @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#isGroupConversation_E@ return true and passing null will make it return false. In @B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#P_E@ and beyond, use @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#setGroupConversation_E@ to set group conversation status.

Parameters: CharSequence: A @B_java#lang#CharSequence_E@ to be displayed as the message content
long: Time at which the message arrived

CharSequence: A @B_java#lang#CharSequence_E@ to be used for displaying the name of the sender. Should be null for messages by the current user, in which case the platform will insert @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#getUserDisplayName_E@. Should be unique amongst all individuals in the conversation, and should be consistent during re-posts of the notification.

Convenience call for a simple @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#Message_E@ in @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#addMessage_E@.

addMessage(java.lang.CharSequence,long,j.FullName: public Notification.MessagingStyle addMessage (CharSequence text, long timestamp, CharSequence sender)

Parameters: Person: Required - The person displayed for any messages that are sent by the user. Any messages added with @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#addMessage_E@ who don't have a Person associated with it will be displayed as if they were sent by this user. The user also needs to have a valid name associated with it, which will be enforced starting in Android P. This value must never be null.

ClassDesc: Helper class for generating large-format notifications that include multiple back-and-forth messages of varying types between any number of people. If the platform does not provide large-format notifications, this method has no effect. The user will always see the normal notification view. If the app is targeting Android P and above, it is required to use the @B_android#app#Person_E@ class in order to get an optimal rendering of the notification and its avatars. For conversations involving multiple people, the app should also make sure that it marks the conversation as a group with @B_android#app#Notification#MessagingStyle#setGroupConversation_E@.
